text: This person is among the Sahabah's ancestors Awwam ibn Khuwaylid () was the father of the companion Zubayr ibn al-Awwam and brother of Islamic prophet Muhammad's wife Khadija bint Khuwaylid. He was from Asad tribe from the Banu Quraish. ==See also== *Family tree of Awwam ibn Khuwaylid *Sahaba ==External links== *http://al-islam.org/beacons/7.htm Category:7th-century Arabs Category:Banu Asad (Quraysh)
title: Awwam ibn Khuwaylid
